name: part_014
file: tmp_【 #桃鈴ねね誕生日Live2025 】ゲストあり！新衣装お披露目あり！ねねリズムバースデーライブ！【 桃鈴ねね ⧸ hololive 】 [d-Ua7CIU34I]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_014.mov

scenes.description: Momosuzu Nene performs the song 'LOVE HEROINE' (LOVE勇者).
Momosuzu Nene gives a brief MC message about the upcoming card opening and mini-games.
Closing credits sequence featuring a remix of 'Nenechi no Gira Gira Fan Meeting'.
scenes.song_name: Nenechi no Gira Gira Fan Meeting

subtitles.original: 羽ばたきたい
subtitles.english: I want to spread my wings

subtitles.original: もっともっともっと
subtitles.english: More, more, and more

subtitles.original: えへっ　本当は根暗
subtitles.english: Hehe, I'm actually a shut-in

subtitles.original: でもめげずに　アイドル
subtitles.english: But I won't give up on being an idol

subtitles.original: その笑顔　限りなく　見てみたいから
subtitles.english: Because I want to see that smile of yours forever

subtitles.original: 思いを込めて　こんねね～！あいうらびゅ～♡
subtitles.english: With all my heart, Konnene~! I love you~♡

subtitles.original: 「最推しかわいい///」　えへっ　サンキュー♡
subtitles.english: "My favorite is so cute///" Hehe, thank you♡

subtitles.original: 他の子にも言ってた　マジで処刑
subtitles.english: If you've been saying that to other girls, it's seriously execution for you

subtitles.original: ねねねねねねね...ねねだけだよねねね...？
subtitles.english: Nene-nene-nene-nene-nene... It's only Nene, right...?

subtitles.original: 金髪ってだけで　陽キャだと思うなよ
subtitles.english: Don't think I'm an extrovert just because I have blonde hair

subtitles.original: 引きこもるぞ　泣いて　マジかよ
subtitles.english: I'll shut myself in and cry, for real

subtitles.original: えへっ☆　卑屈者の
subtitles.english: Hehe☆ An underdog's...

subtitles.original: 光まとった　アイドル
subtitles.english: ...light-clad idol

subtitles.original: 信じてるこれからも　君といること
subtitles.english: I believe that from now on, I'll be with you

subtitles.original: せーの！「はい」っ！！あーーーーーー☆
subtitles.english: One, two! "Yes"!! Ahhhhhhh☆

subtitles.original: 好き好き好きにさせてみせるから
subtitles.english: Because I'll make you like, like, like me

subtitles.original: こっちを向いててよ！
subtitles.english: Keep looking this way!

subtitles.original: ワクワクいっぱいの日にしてくから
subtitles.english: Because I'll make it a day full of excitement

subtitles.original: ねねビームで　バキュン！
subtitles.english: Nene Beam, bang!

subtitles.original: バキュン！この後21時15分、カードオープンそしてミニゲームもよろしくね！
subtitles.english: Bang! After this at 21:15, card opening and mini-games too, so please look forward to it!

subtitles.original: ハッピー・ギラパ！ねねちのギラギラファンミーティングへようこそ！
subtitles.english: Happy Gira-pa! Welcome to Nenechi's Gira Gira Fan Meeting!

subtitles.original: 今回は、ゲストのみんなと一緒にギラギラしていきたいと思います。それじゃあ、いくよ！
subtitles.english: This time, I'd like to get flashy with all the guests. Well then, here we go!

subtitles.original: アミーゴ！カバジェロ！ビバ！ギラパ！
subtitles.english: Amigo! Caballero! Viva! Gira-pa!

subtitles.original: カブクワ　ギラギラ　最後だ　カブクワ
subtitles.english: Kabu-kuwa, flashy, it's the end, kabu-kuwa
